    public interface AccountInvoice
extends com.guidewire.bc.domain.invoice.gen.AccountInvoiceStubI
    AccountInvoice A direct bill invoice for an Account

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IQueryBeanResult<CollateralDrawdown> getAccountCollateralDrawdownsForInvoicePeriod()
      Returns all CollateralDrawdown transactions where the collateral is on the invoice's account, and the transaction date is before the current invoice date and on or after the previous invoice date (if the previous invoice exists)
      IQueryBeanResult<GrossWriteoff> getAccountLevelChargeWriteoffsForInvoicePeriod()
      Returns all account-level charge writeoffs whose WriteoffDate is before the current invoice date and on or after the previous invoice date (if the previous invoice exists).
      IQueryBeanResult<AccountNegativeWriteoffTxn> getAccountLevelNegativeWriteoffsForInvoicePeriod()
      Returns all account-level charge writeoffs whose WriteoffDate is before the current invoice date and on or after the previous invoice date (if the previous invoice exists).
      IQueryBeanResult<TransferTransaction> getAccountTransfersForInvoicePeriod()
      Returns all TransferTransaction transactions where either the source or destination account equals the invoice's account, and the transaction date is before the current invoice date and on or after the previous invoice date (if the previous invoice exists)
      InvoiceLineItem[] getAggregatedInvoiceItems(AggregationType aggregationType) 
      IQueryBeanResult<CreditReversal> getCreditReversalsForInvoicePeriod()
      Returns all Credit reversals on the invoice's account where the credit date is before the current invoice date and on or after the previous invoice date (if the previous invoice exists)
      IQueryBeanResult<CreditReversal> getCreditReversalsForInvoicePeriod(CreditType creditType)
      Returns all Credit reversals of the given creditType on the invoice's account where the credit date is before the current invoice date and on or after the previous invoice date (if the previous invoice exists)
      IQueryBeanResult<Credit> getCreditsForInvoicePeriod()
      Returns all Credits on the invoice's account where the credit date is before the current invoice date and on or after the previous invoice date (if the previous invoice exists)
      IQueryBeanResult<Credit> getCreditsForInvoicePeriod(CreditType creditType)
      Returns all Credits of the given creditType on the invoice's account where the credit date is before the current invoice date and on or after the previous invoice date (if the previous invoice exists)
      IQueryBeanResult<DisbursementPaid> getDisbursementsForInvoicePeriod()
      Returns all DisbursementPaid transactions whose transaction date is before the current invoice date and on or after the previous invoice date (if the previous invoice exists)
      IQueryBeanResult<TransferTransaction> getIncomingProducerTransfersForInvoicePeriod()
      Returns all TransferTransaction transactions where the destination account equals the invoice's account, and the transaction date is before the current invoice date and on or after the previous invoice date (if the previous invoice exists)
      IQueryBeanResult<Charge> getNewAccountChargesForInvoicePeriod()
      Returns all account-level charges that were created on the invoice's account or policy period where the charge effective date is before the current invoice date and on or after the previous invoice date (if the previous invoice exists).
      IQueryBeanResult<Charge> getNewCollateralChargesForInvoicePeriod()
      Returns all collateral charges that were created on the invoice's account or policy period where the charge effective date is before the current invoice date and on or after the previous invoice date (if the previous invoice exists).
      IQueryBeanResult<Charge> getNewPolicyChargesForInvoicePeriod()
      Returns all policy-level charges that were created on the invoice's account or policy period where the charge effective date is before the current invoice date and on or after the previous invoice date (if the previous invoice exists).
      IQueryBeanResult<TransferTransaction> getOutgoingProducerTransfersForInvoicePeriod()
      Returns all TransferTransaction transactions where the source account equals the invoice's account, and the transaction date is before the current invoice date and on or after the previous invoice date (if the previous invoice exists)
      IQueryBeanResult<GrossWriteoff> getPolicyPeriodLevelChargeWriteoffsForInvoicePeriod()
      Returns all account-level charge writeoffs whose WriteoffDate is before the current invoice date and on or after the previous invoice date (if the previous invoice exists).
      AccountInvoice getPreviousInvoice()
      Returns the invoice prior to this invoice
      IQueryBeanResult<InvoiceItem> getUnownedInvoiceItemsCreatedDuringInvoicePeriod()
      Returns invoice items that meet the following criteria: 1) they are on an invoice older than the current invoice 2) they were added or edited on or after the previous invoice date and before the current invoice date

      • getNewAccountChargesForInvoicePeriod

        IQueryBeanResult<Charge> getNewAccountChargesForInvoicePeriod()
        Returns all account-level charges that were created on the invoice's account or policy period where the charge effective date is before the current invoice date and on or after the previous invoice date (if the previous invoice exists). Includes charges that came in during this invoice period which may not have any invoice items on this invoice.
        Returns:
        the new account charges for the period

      • getNewPolicyChargesForInvoicePeriod

        IQueryBeanResult<Charge> getNewPolicyChargesForInvoicePeriod()
        Returns all policy-level charges that were created on the invoice's account or policy period where the charge effective date is before the current invoice date and on or after the previous invoice date (if the previous invoice exists). Includes charges that came in during this invoice period which may not have any invoice items on this invoice
        Returns:
        the new policy charges for the period.

      • getNewCollateralChargesForInvoicePeriod

        IQueryBeanResult<Charge> getNewCollateralChargesForInvoicePeriod()
        Returns all collateral charges that were created on the invoice's account or policy period where the charge effective date is before the current invoice date and on or after the previous invoice date (if the previous invoice exists). Includes charges that came in during this invoice period which may not have any invoice items on this invoice.
        Returns:
        the new collateral charges for the period

        IQueryBeanResult<Credit> getCreditsForInvoicePeriod(CreditType creditType)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
